explanation: Section 4.1 states that each party shall protect the other party's Confidential Information with at least reasonable care, however it is never defined what reasonable care is. This is ambiguous and can cause issues with interpretations.

Section 6.1 states that 'This Agreement, the Purchase Agreement and the documents referred to herein and therein constitute the entire agreement among the Parties', however the Purchase Agreement is not attached to this document. This creates an issue because the other party is not able to see what the Purchase Agreement fully entails and thus this is not the entire agreement.
Section 3.1 states that 'This Agreement be deemed effective as of the Effective Date, Agreement and shall terminate on December 31, 2020', This does not make sense and is a structural flaw.
